from.info: Traded Tim Gleason to Capitals for Jack Hillen, 2015 fourth round pick on 2015-02-28
Traded Jiri Tlusty to Jets for 2015 conditional pick (fifth round if Jets qualify for 2015 playoffs, else sixth round), 2016 third round pick on 2015-02-25
Traded Jay Harrison to Jets for 2015 sixth round pick on 2014-12-18
Traded Andrej Sekera to Kings for Roland McKeown, conditional first round pick (in 2015 if Kings qualify for 2015 playoff, else 2016) on 2015-02-25
Traded Jiri Tlusty to Jets for 2015 conditional round pick (fifth round if Jets qualify for 2015 playoffs, else sixth round), 2016 third round pick on 2015-02-25
Traded Tuomo Ruutu to Devils for Andrei Loktionov, 2017 conditional third round pick on 2014-03-05 (Conditions on pick are unconfirmed.)
